column4: how can i install open office 3? only the old version is in synaptic (2.4) and it doesnt format documents the same.  i dled the package from the website but its full of rpms
rpms are for Fedora/RedHat ... Ubuntu uses .debs
hehe i know thats the problem, can you not use the modern OO on ubuntu?
bah, bazhang beat me to it, follow what he just told you
